title: Short term holders sent record $3 billion in profit to exchanges
description:

title: Behind bars, Ex-FTX Sam Bankman-Fried chief champions Solana’s crypto potential
description: In an unexpected turn of events, Sam Bankman-Fried, the former CEO of FTX, has found himself in prison, where he’s been actively working on his legal defense. However, rather than allowing his circumstances to dampen his spirits, Bankman-Fried has been utilizing his time to share insights into the cryptocurrency market, particularly promoting Solana’s (SOL) potential. title: Revolutionizing Connectivity: AI-Driven 6G Networks Unveiled at MWC
description: The Mobile World Congress (MWC) in Barcelona witnessed a groundbreaking revelation as industry giants converged to unveil the next leap in mobile network technology. title: Revolutionizing International Trade: IOTA Foundation Joins Forces for TLIP Initiative
description: The IOTA Foundation has forged a significant collaboration with strategic partners to revolutionize global trade by leveraging TLIP technology, aiming to eradicate fraud risks associated with physical documents. TLIP, powered by IOTA’s distributed ledger technology, aims to streamline information exchange and foster collaboration across borders in international trade. title: Will Bitcoin Hit Its Peak Before the Halving?
description:
Scheduled to occur approximately every four years, this event has historically been a catalyst for significant price movements in Bitcoin. As the next halving nears, speculation grows on whether Bitcoin will surpass its peak before the event. In this article, we’ll provide a trading analysis from our TA lead.
